overview: Fourth reworking of the classic Grace Miller White novel, this time updated to the 60s, with young Scottish lassie Tess (Diane Baker) becoming embroiled in a conflict about a toxic chemical plant near her new home in Pennsylvania.
tagline: The Wonderful Love Story Everyone Fell in Love With Is On The Screen in Color by DeLuxe and CinemaScope!
title: Tess of the Storm Country
